['', 'Immediate full time employment opportunity for an experienced Data Scientist eager to make an impact in a rapidly growing non-profit educational organization focused on improving student performance and developing strategies for career readiness. Qualified candidates will have at least 3+ years of experience in a data science or senior data analytics position, experienced in data management, and relational databases. The Data Scientist is responsible for acquisition, manipulation, complex statistical analysis, and reporting of data from public and private sources in support of educational non-profit initiatives and partner engagements. Will use a broad range of tools and techniques including predictive analytics, machine learning and other emergent and existing approaches to quickly analyze end-user needs, design, test, and develop relational databases to satisfy reporting demands. Expertise in SQL and data analytics required.', 'Desired Skills and Experience']

['', 'Full Stack Data Scientist\xa0', 'We believe that the Full Stack Data Scientist is passionate about IT and Software solutions, and experienced with AI, machine learning, and software development. It is envisaged that the right person for the role is an excellent problem solver and team player, who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment and can prioritize work appropriately. Moreover, you have solid presentation and communication skills, and will be able to translate business concepts into technical requirements and vice versa.', 'Deploy models in a production environment on the cloud', 'ASAP', 'Location for this job:\xa0United States', 'Interested in an unparalleled data enthusiast career path, and passionate for AI and Machine Learning?\xa0', 'Fluent/Professional level\u202fEnglish', 'Wanted competence and experience:', 'founding members', 'Understand our customers’ business goals and explore opportunities for adding value with AI and digital solutionsDesign software and cloud architecture of solutionsBuild machine learning models for various use cases (computer vision, NLP, time series, recommender system, etc.)Deploy models in a production environment on the cloudInteract with customers to explain solutions, gather feedback, and explore opportunities continuously', 'Application deadline:\xa0ASAP. We will evaluate candidates continuously', 'Language requirements:\xa0Fluent/Professional level\u202fEnglish, written & spoken', 'Location for this job:\xa0United StatesLanguage requirements:\xa0Fluent/Professional level\u202fEnglish, written & spokenApplication deadline:\xa0ASAP. We will evaluate candidates continuouslyVisa requirements:\xa0Must be legally authorized and eligible to work in the US on a permanent basis without the requirement of visa sponsorship. We are looking for someone that could start relatively quickly. If you are located outside of the US, please detail in your application when you are planning to move here and when you could start.', 'As the winner of Microsoft AI and ML Partner of the Year 2019, ', 'CoE USA ', 'Strong communication and presentation skills', 'Build machine learning models for various use cases (computer vision, NLP, time series, recommender system, etc.)', 'Advanced in Python and common Python libraries for classic machine learning (Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, etc.) and modern deep learning frameworks (Tensorflow, PyTorch)', 'Interact with customers to explain solutions, gather feedback, and explore opportunities continuously', "Advanced competency in at least one of the following aspects: time series, computer vision, natural language processing3+ years' working experience with machine learning and/or software developmentWorking experience in framing AI and/or ML problems in a business environmentAdvanced in Python and common Python libraries for classic machine learning (Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, etc.) and modern deep learning frameworks (Tensorflow, PyTorch)Working experience with version control and collaborative development (Git, GitHub/GitLab)Experience with model deployment on cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP)Knowledge of DevOps automation: CI/CD, containerization, infrastructure as code, etc.Strong communication and presentation skills", 'As the winner of Microsoft AI and ML Partner of the Year 2019, Crayon’s global Centers of Excellence (CoE)\xa0has been successful in understanding our customers’ business goals and delivering customized 100+ data-driven solutions in the past 5 years. Our established CoE USA is searching for\xa0a Full Stack Data Scientist\xa0to join the\xa0founding members, where you will work closely with our great talents domestically in the US and globally in Oslo, Vienna, Dubai, and Singapore. The overriding goal for this role is to build end-to-end ML solutions for our customers, including framing business problems, designing solutions, building and deploying ML models. In addition, you will be developing software architecture on cloud-based solutions.', 'Design software and cloud architecture of solutions', "Crayon specializes in supporting customers across all industry sectors with complex local, regional, and global IT estates. Our experts help advise customers to specify, plan, deploy, manage, and optimize technology ecosystems. We are a global leader in IT and digital transformation services and the largest independent 'cloud economics' practice. We are trusted technical advisors to many of the world's leading organizations and through our unique people, tools, and systems we help optimize our clients' ROI from complex technology investments. As specialists, we partner with the biggest names in software vendor management, including Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Symantec, VMware, IBM, and Oracle. Today we are more than 2000 colleagues globally, spanning 35 countries,\xa0and an unparalleled entrepreneurial mindset.", 'As a Full Stack Data Scientist, your main objectives are:', '\xa0', 'Keen to join our expanding US-based Center of Excellence?', "3+ years' working experience with machine learning and/or software development", ' Center of Excellence USA!', ' ', 'Full Stack Data Scientist', 'Interested in an unparalleled data enthusiast career path, and passionate for AI and Machine Learning?\xa0Want to be part of the dynamic and innovative environment delivering data-driven solutions for our customers?Keen to join our expanding US-based Center of Excellence?', 'Practical Information:', 'Want to be part of the dynamic and innovative environment delivering data-driven solutions for our customers?', 'Understand our customers’ business goals and explore opportunities for adding value with AI and digital solutions', 'Working experience in framing AI and/or ML problems in a business environment', 'Advanced competency in at least one of the following aspects: time series, computer vision, natural language processing', 'Visa requirements:\xa0Must be legally authorized and eligible to work in the US on a permanent basis without the requirement of visa sponsorship. We are looking for someone that could start relatively quickly. If you are located outside of the US, please detail in your application when you are planning to move here and when you could start.', 'Crayon specializes in supporting customers across all industry sectors with complex local, regional, and global IT estates. ', 'Knowledge of DevOps automation: CI/CD, containerization, infrastructure as code, etc.', 'We believe that the Full Stack Data Scientist is passionate about IT and Software solutions', 'United States', 'Experience with model deployment on cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP)', 'Working experience with version control and collaborative development (Git, GitHub/GitLab)', 'Apply now and join our global team as a\xa0Full Stack Data Scientist\xa0for our Center of Excellence USA!', 'Must be legally authorized and eligible to work in the US on a permanent basis without the requirement of visa sponsorship']

['', 'Regular development experience in major statistical scripting languages', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills', 'Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms\xa0', 'Experience with major NLP frameworks (spaCy, fasttext, BERT)', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field; Master’s or PHD preferredMinimum 3 years hands on data science experienceRegular development experience in major statistical scripting languagesPrior hands-on experience working with data-driven analytics\xa0Proven ability to develop solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over large datasets\xa0Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms\xa0Experience using machine learning algorithms (e.g., gradient-boosted machines, neural networks)Ability to work independently with little supervisionStrong communication and interpersonal skillsA burning desire to work in a challenging fast paced environment", 'Experience building datasets from common database tools using flavors of SQL', 'Familiarity with Git source control management', 'We firmly believe that past performance is the best indicator of future performance. If you believe you meet the qualifications above, and you’re prepared to perform complex, mentally rigorous work, we’re eager to hear from you.\xa0', 'Optimize processes for maximum speed, performance and accuracy; craft clean, testable, and maintainable code', 'This is a full-time team member position, working onsite in our Pittsburgh, PA office.', 'Govini is a decision science firm dedicated to transforming the business of national security through data science and machine learning. Through its data and analytic platform, Govini delivers objective, decision-grade information at scale to the national security enterprise, so that leaders can better direct investments to innovation and modernization. Govini has offices in Arlington, Virginia, San Francisco, California, and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.', 'We are seeking an inquisitive data scientist to join our team and work with our various datasets to find connections, knowledge, and potential issues in order to help our government clients make more informed decisions.\xa0\xa0Your role on the Data Science team will be primarily focused on our large datasets, and you will design and implement scalable statistical systems based on your analysis. You will have the opportunity to expand and grow data-driven research across Govini, and lead new areas to apply advanced analytics to drive business results.\xa0', 'Design experiments, test hypotheses, and build models for advanced data analysis and complex algorithms', 'Design experiments, test hypotheses, and build models for advanced data analysis and complex algorithmsApply advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems\xa0Make strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements, incorporating business requirements and knowledge of data industry best practicesModel and frame business scenarios that are meaningful and which impact critical processes and decisions; transform, standardize, and integrate datasets for client use casesConvert custom, complex and manual client data analysis tasks into repeatable, configurable processes for consistent and scalable use within the Govini SaaS platformOptimize processes for maximum speed, performance and accuracy; craft clean, testable, and maintainable codePartner with internal Govini business analysts and external client teams to seek out the best solutions regarding data-driven problem solvingParticipate in end-to-end software development, on an agile team in a scrum process, collaborating closely with fellow software, machine learning, data and QA engineers', 'Prior hands-on experience working with data-driven analytics\xa0', 'Current possession of a U.S. security clearance or the ability to obtain one', 'Company Description', 'Govini is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'A burning desire to work in a challenging fast paced environment', 'Experience working on agile/scrum teams', 'Desired Skills:', 'Experience working in a product organization', 'Model and frame business scenarios that are meaningful and which impact critical processes and decisions; transform, standardize, and integrate datasets for client use cases', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field; Master’s or PHD preferred", 'Familiarity with big data frameworks (e.g., HDFS, Spark) and AWS', 'Make strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements, incorporating business requirements and knowledge of data industry best practices', 'Scope of Responsibilities', 'Experience in or exposure to the nuances of a startup or other entrepreneurial environment', 'Minimum 3 years hands on data science experience', 'Proven ability to develop solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over large datasets\xa0', 'Expertise with automation and streaming data', 'Convert custom, complex and manual client data analysis tasks into repeatable, configurable processes for consistent and scalable use within the Govini SaaS platform', 'Partner with internal Govini business analysts and external client teams to seek out the best solutions regarding data-driven problem solving', 'Participate in end-to-end software development, on an agile team in a scrum process, collaborating closely with fellow software, machine learning, data and QA engineers', 'In order to do this job well, you must be a highly organized problem-solver and possess excellent oral and written communication skills. You are independent, driven and motivated to jump in and roll up your sleeves to get the job done. You lead by influence and motivation. You have a passion for great work and nothing less than your best will do. You share our intolerance of mediocrity. You’re uber-smart, challenged by figuring things out and producing simple solutions to complex problems. Knowing there are always multiple answers to a problem, you know how to engage in a constructive dialogue to find the best path forward. You’re scrappy. We like scrappy.', 'Required Skills:', 'Apply advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems\xa0', 'Experience working on agile/scrum teamsExperience building datasets from common database tools using flavors of SQLExpertise with automation and streaming dataExperience with major NLP frameworks (spaCy, fasttext, BERT)Familiarity with big data frameworks (e.g., HDFS, Spark) and AWSFamiliarity with Git source control managementExperience working in a product organizationExperience in or exposure to the nuances of a startup or other entrepreneurial environmentCurrent possession of a U.S. security clearance or the ability to obtain one', 'Experience using machine learning algorithms (e.g., gradient-boosted machines, neural networks)', 'Ability to work independently with little supervision', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', 'US Citizenship is required']

['', 'Supervisory Responsibilities', 'May train data management team on new or updated procedures.', ' DEMANDS', 'Summary', 'WORK ENVIRONMENT', 'Formulate business problems into concrete mathematical framework, and translating analytic results into actionable business recommendations.', 'May write and implement procedures.', 'Assist with projects and other job-related duties as assigned.', 'Train the data management team on new or updated procedures.Formulate business problems into concrete mathematical framework, and translating analytic results into actionable business recommendations.May write and implement procedures.May train data management team on new or updated procedures.', 'Use existing machine learning tools or develop customized algorithms to solve analytical problems with incomplete data sets and deploy automated processes into production.', 'Jump start your Data Scientists career with the leading plastic pipe manufacturing company in the US.', 'Computer Skills', 'Mathematical Skills', 'REASONING ABILITY', 'EDUCATION And/or EXPERIENCE', 'Data Scientist', 'Train the data management team on new or updated procedures.', 'Language Skills', 'PHYSICAL', 'Conduct scalable data research on manufacturing and sales data.', 'Use existing machine learning tools or develop customized algorithms to solve analytical problems with incomplete data sets and deploy automated processes into production.Conduct scalable data research on manufacturing and sales data.Create new software designed to access and handle data more efficiently.', 'Qualifications', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES ', 'Create new software designed to access and handle data more efficiently.']

['', 'Founded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies.', 'ByteDance Networking brings together innovative ideas and technologies from network architecture, software defined networking (SDN), network virtualization, switch software and hardware co-design, and high-speed networking, to create hyperscale data-center networking solutions that power several of the most popular apps of the world such as Douyin and TikTok which serve hundreds of millions of users around the globe.', '• Master of at least one of the mainstream coding languages including Python, Java, R, Scala, Go, C++, etc, and capability to read and understand others;', 'With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Helo and Resso, ByteDance now has a portfolio of applications available in over 150 markets and 75 languages.', '• Bachelor degree or above in Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science , Electrical Engineerings is preferred; master or Ph.D with networking research experience is a plus.', '\ufeffQualifications', 'ByteDance is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or accommodation, please reach out to usrc@bytedance.com\ufeff', '• Great verbal and written communication skills;', '• Hands on experience handling terabyte size datasets, applying statistics and machine learning techniques and algorithms, using visualization tools to present data;', '\ufeff', '• Interact with teams (both internal/external to networking) to understand use cases and define specific requirements for networking data analysis;', 'ByteDance Networking is responsible for designing, building, and operating the global, intelligent network infrastructure to meet the requirements of high availability, scalability, and high-performance. By joining this team, you will gain marketable software development and/or network operation experiences in data center networking at massive scale.', "We are looking for candidates with strong networking background, solid data analysis and software development skills, who can utilise data-driven techniques in building solutions to help manage, scale and optimize Bytedance's networking infrastructure.", '• Develop analytical models to extract statistical properties and causality from and between networking events;', '• Strong networking and distributed system background with solid understanding of common protocols, network monitoring techniques such as sFlow, SNMP, etc; experience in large scale networking system development is a plus;', 'Responsibilities', '• Develop scalable software pipeline for collection and aggregation of a vast amount of data retrieved from underlying networking systems, including but not limited to network resource usage, traffic statistics, device operation status, etc., and make the data universally available for both real-time and retrospective/forensic analysis use cases;', "• Continuously make recommendations/prediction based on results derived to optimize networking system efficiency and improve underlying networking infrastructure's availability.", "ByteDance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At ByteDance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

['', 'You have an applied research mindset and are pragmatic in seeking information to test hypotheses and design solutions.You like to get hands-on with data and seek out empirical proof through the design and execution of experiments.You are intellectually curious and can identify the generalized learning from any specific project situation.You are effective at project planning and can prioritize across projects competing for limited resources.You work best in collaborative settings with team members of diverse backgrounds and skill sets.You are empathetic to a less technical audience when explaining a complicated problem so we can all make a better decision.', 'Good knowledge of Machine Learning and AI principles, along with familiarity with some of the most common models (random forests, deep learning, CNNs).', 'Familiarity with cloud computing, especially with GCP.', 'You have an applied research mindset and are pragmatic in seeking information to test hypotheses and design solutions.', 'You are empathetic to a less technical audience when explaining a complicated problem so we can all make a better decision.', 'Advanced experience with data science, statistical analysis, and data visualization (particularly in the geospatial domain). ['', 'Protein purification and enzymatic assay.', 'Experience in yeast strain engineering.', 'We are looking for a research scientist/bioinformatician to join our start-up team in Fremont, CA. The candidate will participate in our R&D efforts and will perform experiments/bioinformatic analysis for yeast strain engineering. The primary focus of this candidate will be facilitating the synthetic biology of secondary metabolite production for pharmaceutical applications. ['', 'Minimum Experience, Skills, and Education:', 'We are looking for top talent anywhere in the U.S.A, with a preference for the Denver, CO, or Northern California areas for a role that is work from home, with occasional travel to meet with the engineering team (once the pandemic is under control). ', '- Being able to work under pressure in a startup environment', "BioIntelliSense is ushering in a new era of continuous health monitoring and clinical intelligence for Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) and Screening (COVID-19/Infection). Our medical-grade Data-as-a-Service (DaaS) platform seamlessly captures multi-parameter vital signs, physiological biometrics and symptomatic events through an effortless patient experience. The FDA-cleared BioSticker and BioButton devices make remote monitoring and early detection simple. Experience with time-series sensor data at scale along with sensor fusion algorithms background.', ' sensor fusion algorithms', 'time-series sensor data', 'We are seeking a Data Science Engineer to help spearhead our catalogue of cloud-based BioSignatures for early detection and screening for various disease states and physiological deterioration.  ', 'This is a unique opportunity to apply your experience, roll-up-your-sleeves and significantly contribute to the rapid development, growth and expansion of BioIntelliSense in delivering clinical intelligence, globally. ', 'Data Science Engineer', 'For more information on how BioIntelliSense is redefining remote patient monitoring through medical-grade and cost-effective data services, please contact us at info@biointellisense.com or visit our website at BioIntelliSense.com.', '- Developing and reviewing system architecture to optimize the balance across cloud vs. edge processing. ', 'Experience with code and process documentation', ' Python  Spark  Data pipeline experience ', 'Experience as an individual contributor, hands-on developer, non-manager role executing on engineering projects as a primary job responsibility ', 'Combine two of the fastest-growing fields on the planet with a culture of performance, collaboration and opportunity and this is what you get. Someone that will also be responsible for good data management practices (for example to make sure we can efficiently retire data from H-groups that need to be retired).  Currently the main technologies we are using are Spark, Hadoop, Hive, Luigi, Python (and a little bit of Scala) and the platform we use is the on-prem Hadoop cluster. We need to make sure the candidate is solid with at least some of these technologies, and follows good engineering practices (such as testing, code reviews and putting in place monitoring systems like dashboards or alerts).  Additional skills that would be good to have: cloud (since there is push for OA to move to AWS, nothing says we will stay forever on the on-prem cluster), and Elasticsearch (we need to build and keep up-to-date Elastic indices to allow users external to our group to search the notes). job_text: ['', 'Represent Twitter research internally (e.g., to xfn teams, Staff, at all-hands meetings) and externally (e.g., via blog posts, conference presentations, white papers).', 'Responsibilities', 'Lead the proactive discovery, exploration and development of insights to drive strategy to deliver potential non-ads revenue product solutions for Twitter.Promote and lead the building of foresight and synthesis of trends through investigation of rapidly shifting marketplace dynamics, emerging data sources & technologies and the ever-changing consumer and business landscape by connecting the dots, seeding ideas, and storytelling to drive better business decisions around emerging opportunitiesLead purposeful relationship-building with a wide array of partners (e.g., Design, Product, Engineering), other research teams, and beyond.Represent Twitter research internally (e.g., to xfn teams, Staff, at all-hands meetings) and externally (e.g., via blog posts, conference presentations, white papers).', 'What You’ll Do ', 'Lead purposeful relationship-building with a wide array of partners (e.g., Design, Product, Engineering), other research teams, and beyond.', 'Lead the proactive discovery, exploration and development of insights to drive strategy to deliver potential non-ads revenue product solutions for Twitter.', 'Promote and lead the building of foresight and synthesis of trends through investigation of rapidly shifting marketplace dynamics, emerging data sources & technologies and the ever-changing consumer and business landscape by connecting the dots, seeding ideas, and storytelling to drive better business decisions around emerging opportunities', 'Job Description']

['', 'Develop, test, and deploy ML models for various computer vision tasks.', 'Fyusion is a machine learning & computer vision company that enables anyone to capture and display interactive 3D 360 images using their smartphone. Our unique 3D format allows for significant additional functionality that 2D images can’t offer, including: background image effects & automatic damage detection for cars, and an understanding of the human skeleton for tagging products & features in fashion E-commerce. Our investors and customers include large international conglomerates and industry leaders, which puts us in a unique and advantageous position. We have ambitious goals and are looking for new energetic team members to help us reach them together.\xa0', 'Define evaluation procedures for the developed algorithms.', 'Robust exploratory/experimental skills. We have the largest multi-view dataset in the industry and are using both single- and multi-view visual data within our algorithms.', 'The research team at Fyusion develops and applies state of the art algorithms in visualization, 3D reconstruction, SLAM, bundle adjustment, state estimation, and sensor fusion. We are looking for candidates who are excited about solving complex problems at the intersection of classical 3D geometry and Deep Learning. You will have the resources and opportunities to publish your work at major conferences.', 'Create and maintain datasets for machine learning tasks. Manage data pipelines for training ML models on data uploaded by Fyusion customers.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, or a related field.', 'Experience with 3D geometry and/or multi-view data is a plus.', 'Proficient in Python (Pytorch or Tensorflow).Experience with machine learning using visual data is required.', 'Participating in the engineering life-cycle at Fyusion, including designing systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our design, engineering, and QA teams.', "Develop, test, and deploy ML models for various computer vision tasks.Robust exploratory/experimental skills. We have the largest multi-view dataset in the industry and are using both single- and multi-view visual data within our algorithms.Maintain insight into trends and advances in machine learning.Implement and advance models from the research community, including literature surveys and implementing novel techniques from research papers.Work as part of a team and contribute to a common code base.Create and maintain datasets for machine learning tasks. Manage data pipelines for training ML models on data uploaded by Fyusion customers.Define evaluation procedures for the developed algorithms.Demonstrate engineering skills. This is a hybrid research/engineering role. You'll be responsible for productionizing your pipelines/models and integrating them against our back-end services.Participating in the engineering life-cycle at Fyusion, including designing systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our design, engineering, and QA teams.", "Here's what we are looking for:", 'Implement and advance models from the research community, including literature surveys and implementing novel techniques from research papers.', 'Experience in C++ is a plus.', 'Maintain insight into trends and advances in machine learning.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, or a related field.Proficient in Python (Pytorch or Tensorflow).Experience with machine learning using visual data is required.Experience with 3D geometry and/or multi-view data is a plus.Experience in C++ is a plus.', 'Work as part of a team and contribute to a common code base.', "Demonstrate engineering skills. This is a hybrid research/engineering role. You'll be responsible for productionizing your pipelines/models and integrating them against our back-end services.", "Here's the day-to-day:"]

['', 'We’re looking for engaged and innovative people who love to learn new technologies, are quick problem thinkers, and are able to navigate complex environments. A User Experience Researcher at DeepScribe has the opportunity to help us design the new doctor and patient experience - changing the way that doctors practice medicine and how patients receive care. An ideal candidate will be bold, as they will be making key decisions that define the future of healthcare, and taking ownership of their work.\xa0', '3+ years of full-time experience', 'Has worked across multiple products and servicesExperience working in the healthcare industry', 'DeepScribe', '3+ years of full-time experience in user experience research, preferably in the technology or healthcare sector. HCI or product research and development are great too!', 'Join\xa0DeepScribe\xa0and be a part of the next technological transition in health care - voice. Our goal is to empower physicians with the tools they need to improve both efficiency and efficacy, and better patient outcomes by increasing the clarity, trust, and understanding they have with their physician. Through AI, we hope to better the bogged-down health care industry, and re-think the future of practicing and receiving medicine.', 'Experience with different research strategies and methods, knowing the pros and shortcomings of each, and being able to identify which to use in specific scenarios', 'About the role', 'Other:', '3+ years of full-time experience in user experience research, preferably in the technology or healthcare sector. HCI or product research and development are great too!A strong portfolio that shows the thought process of breaking down challenging problems and being able to communicate findings in a clear and compelling wayExperience with different research strategies and methods, knowing the pros and shortcomings of each, and being able to identify which to use in specific scenarios', 'Bonus points:', 'Although our HQ is in San Francisco, this will be a remote role through at least 2021!', 'Experience working in the healthcare industry', 'A strong portfolio that shows the thought process of breaking down challenging problems and being able to communicate findings in a clear and compelling way', 'Has worked across multiple products and services', "What we're looking for:"]

job_text: ['', 'Engineering lentivirus to target specific cell types', 'PhD in biological sciences focusing on a fundamental understanding of gene therapy products (LVV, AdV, AAV, or ideally all 3).', 'Bringing knowledge of both innate and adaptive immune responses to gene therapy-based therapeutics', 'bluebird bio is deeply committed to fostering an environment where diversity and inclusion are not only valued, but prioritized. We believe a diverse and inclusive community empowers us to act courageously, care deeply, and dream boldly to impact people in big ways. Diverse viewpoints bring diverse capabilities which strengthen our focus and fuel our growth. ', 'Strong background in primary cell culture', 'Extensive experience testing gene therapy technologies in preclinical rodent models', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment, meet deadlines, and prioritize and balance work from multiple sources', 'Experience focused on the immune response to gene therapy vectors is ideal. Post-doc experience a bonus.', 'Applying technical expertise to develop next generation in vitro assays to understand lentiviral transduction and understand primary cell responses to viral components', 'Development skills within flow cytometry, ELISA, qPCR, IHC, and gene expression analysis techniques', 'About The Nest', ' PhD in biological sciences focusing on a fundamental understanding of gene therapy products (LVV, AdV, AAV, or ideally all 3). Experience focused on the immune response to gene therapy vectors is ideal. Post-doc experience a bonus. Extensive experience testing gene therapy technologies in preclinical rodent models Development skills within flow cytometry, ELISA, qPCR, IHC, and gene expression analysis techniques Proficiency with molecular biology techniques and plasmid cloning Strong background in primary cell culture Mastery of viral vector design and production; knowledge of lentiviral platforms is a plus Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment, meet deadlines, and prioritize and balance work from multiple sources ', 'Mastery of viral vector design and production; knowledge of lentiviral platforms is a plus', 'About The Flock', 'What You’ll Bring', "At bluebird, only two things matter - patients and our people. When you join the nest, you're not just landing a new gig, you become a part of a flock that's soaring to new heights. We’re 1100+ doers, thinkers and collaborators across the globe with a strong sense of our values and our purpose. Our innovation and sustainability are rooted in the diversity of our teams and results are achieved through cooperation and the incorporation of multiple points of view. This is personal and we approach every challenge with radical care. The time is now to rise up and recode the science, the systems, and the status quo.", ' Bringing knowledge of both innate and adaptive immune responses to gene therapy-based therapeutics Applying technical expertise to develop next generation in vitro assays to understand lentiviral transduction and understand primary cell responses to viral components Engineering lentivirus to target specific cell types ', 'bluebird is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other applicable legally protected characteristics.', 'Proficiency with molecular biology techniques and plasmid cloning', "How You'll Fly"]

job_text: ['', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Advanced ability to draw insights from data and clearly communicate them to the stakeholders and senior management.', ' up one’s sleeves to get the job done.', ' up one’s sleeves to get the job done. Have ability to independently influence and drive outputs, meet deadlines, and set clear expectations and roadmaps. Ability to distill problem definitions, models, and constraints from informal business requirements. Demonstrate deep understanding of source data from various internal/external systems. Own the logic for analytical models. Communicate and present findings to stakeholders. Automate models to produce analytical recommendations. Work in an ambiguous environment, drawing out and developing business requirements to meet changing needs.', ' Be self-driven, and show ability to deliver on ambiguous projects with incomplete or dirty data.', 'Description', 'Company', ' BA/BS in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics, Finance or related field. 0-3+ years’ experience as a BA, BIE, data scientist, data engineer or similar job function with a technology company. job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'General Requirements:', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0']

['', 'You have a deep understanding of data engineering tools and platforms such as Kafka, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Successfully built large-scale data pipelines and data-centric applications using any of the distributed storage platforms such as HDFS, S3, NoSQL databases (Hbase, Cassandra, etc.) and any of the distributed processing platforms like Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Oozie, and Airflow in a production settingYou have a deep understanding of data engineering tools and platforms such as Kafka, Spark, and HadoopHands on experience in MapR, Cloudera, Hortonworks and/or cloud (AWS EMR, Azure HDInsights, Qubole etc.) based Hadoop distributions', 'Requirements:', 'jnowicki@huntsource.io', 'Successfully built large-scale data pipelines and data-centric applications using any of the distributed storage platforms such as HDFS, S3, NoSQL databases (Hbase, Cassandra, etc.) and any of the distributed processing platforms like Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Oozie, and Airflow in a production setting', 'Permanent, direct hire opportunity.\xa0As a Lead Engineer you will develop modern data architecture approaches to meet key business objectives and provide end-to-end data solutions.\xa0This is a blended role where you will spend time digging into technical reviews, hands on coding, lead design of solutions, and provide technical direction to associate engineers.\xa0This is an opportunity to join a bright, outgoing, and talented group.\xa0It requires someone who is equally happy coding as well as leading people.', 'For consideration please send an updated resume to Jaymes:\xa0jnowicki@huntsource.io', 'This is fully funded, and we are scheduling interviews immediately.\xa0At this time, our client is only considering candidates that will not require any visa sponsorship.\xa0', 'Lead Data Engineer ', 'Hands on experience in MapR, Cloudera, Hortonworks and/or cloud (AWS EMR, Azure HDInsights, Qubole etc.) based Hadoop distributions']

['', 'Do you want to be part of the next big thing and have fun doing it? DataKitchen has an excellent opportunity for a Data Engineer or Customer Success professional to be part of an exciting, growing company delivering a cloud-based DataOps Solution! We are leading the DataOps movement, making it possible for enterprise data teams to turn data into true business value. DataKitchen was honored as 2019 Gartner Cool Vendor and a CRN Big Data “Start-Up to Watch” in 2020. Our company is profitable, rapidly growing and stock will be part of the package.', 'Why You Should Work at DataKitchen', 'Desired Tools and Experience', 'DataKitchen has a culture of trust and transparency. As a Data Engineer at DataKitchen, you will own and take responsibility for the work you do. We pride ourselves on being collaborative amongst the team and with our customers. We are always asking “Is there a better way we can do this?”, refactoring and building on what we have done as a team.', 'We follow agile development practices while embracing our errors and falling forward. ['Examine existing data and product designs to generate hypotheses and plans for high-impact research', 'As a Quantitative UX Researcher, you combine skills in experimental design, statistical analysis, programming, and human-computer interaction to improve the user experience. As a key member of a product team, you work with stakeholders across functions and levels. You solve challenging problems and empower the team to move forward by developing metrics, measuring results, and integrating new methodologies into existing systems. You do more than just crunch numbers: through reports and team engagement, you provide a UX perspective on quantitative data to help stakeholders understand their users.', 'Make research findings convincing and actionable for both research experts and non-experts', 'Requirements:', 'Prioritize and drive research to improve user experience.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics (such as Python, R, Matlab, C++, Java or Go), and with SQL', 'If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, please apply!About Genesis10:Genesis10 is a leading U.S. business and technology consulting firm with hundreds of clients needing proven talent and solutions to power their strategic initiatives. If you are a high performing business or IT professional with solid, referenced experience, we want to meet you. Genesis10 recruiters and delivery professionals are highly accomplished career advocates, who get to know you beyond your resume to position you with the opportunities that fit your skills, experience and aspirations. We have benefit options to fit your needs and a support staff that works with you from placement throughout your engagement  project after project.  To learn more about Genesis10 and to view all our available career opportunities, please visit us at www.genesis10.com.   "Genesis10 is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Human-computer Interaction, Statistics, Psychology or a related field, or equivalent practical experience2-5 years of experience in an applied research settingSolid understanding of strengths and shortcomings of different quantitative research methodsExperience in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics (such as Python, R, Matlab, C++, Java or Go), and with SQLStrong oral and written communication skillsAble to work as a W2 employee of Genesis10 (no Corp-to-Corp)Desired:Experience with MaxDiffs, Conjoint methods", 'Genesis10 is currently seeking a Quantitative UX Researcher with our client in the SEO industry in their Mountain View, CA location. As a key member of a product team, you work with stakeholders across functions and levels. You solve challenging problems and empower the team to move forward by developing metrics, measuring results, and integrating new methodologies into existing systems. You do more than just crunch numbers: through reports and team engagement, you provide a UX perspective on quantitative data to help stakeholders understand their users.Coming up with solutions is only one part of your job. Equally important is to identify and quantify problems, and to embark on new research areas worth exploring through innovative methods. You apply principles of rigorous and ethical research to build and improve products that satisfy users' needs and exceed their expectations.", 'Able to work as a W2 employee of Genesis10 (no Corp-to-Corp)', 'Desired:Experience with MaxDiffs, Conjoint methods', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Human-computer Interaction, Statistics, Psychology or a related field, or equivalent practical experience", 'Solid understanding of strengths and shortcomings of different quantitative research methods', 'Experience with MaxDiffs, Conjoint methods', 'Communicate findings to stakeholders in the company', 'Develop code and statistical models to understand user experience', '2-5 years of experience in an applied research setting', 'Seeking a Quantitative UX Researcher', "Coming up with solutions is only one part of your job. You apply principles of rigorous and ethical research to build and improve products that satisfy users' needs and exceed their expectations.", "Project Overview:As a Quantitative UX Researcher, you combine skills in experimental design, statistical analysis, programming, and human-computer interaction to improve the user experience. You do more than just crunch numbers: through reports and team engagement, you provide a UX perspective on quantitative data to help stakeholders understand their users.Coming up with solutions is only one part of your job. Equally important is to identify and quantify problems, and to embark on new research areas worth exploring through innovative methods. You apply principles of rigorous and ethical research to build and improve products that satisfy users' needs and exceed their expectations.", 'Strong oral and written communication skills']

['', 'Qualifications:', 'In this role, you will:', "• Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills to identify and resolve clients' issues.", '• Design experimental plans and write appropriately scoped proposals for clients.', '• Significant experience with Word, Powerpoint, Excel, or equivalent software.', '• Mentor and/or lead a group of scientists.', '• Perform other relevant duties as assigned.', '• Thorough knowledge of and hands-on experience with pharmaceutical solids and/or crystallization process development is a significant advantage.', '• Maintain appropriate documentation (records and lab notebooks).', '• Convey experimental and analytical results to clients in data summaries and reports.', 'Join our talented workforce, where a commitment to excellence and a customer-focused attitude is everything. We pursue excellence because our work has the power to improve patients’ lives with the pharmaceuticals we develop and manufacture.', '• Interpret data from a wide range of solid-state and particle characterization techniques.', '• Comply with cGMP procedures, safety requirements, and company policies.', '• Strong background in materials characterization and assessment of powder properties.', 'AMRI provides global contract research and manufacturing services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries.', '• Experience working in a GMP environment.', '• Oversee and/or perform laboratory experiments in the areas of solid form screening of pharmaceutical compounds including but not limited to polymorph, salt, cocrystal, crystallization, and solid dispersion screens.', '• Ph.D. in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Pharmaceutical Sciences or related discipline with at least 2 years of relevant experience or MS in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, or Pharmaceutical Sciences with at least 5 years of relevant experience.', 'The Sr. Research Scientist is an integral part of the AMRI team, contributing to our success by performing solid form screening experiments, interpreting solid-state analytical data, and expertly reporting the results.', '• Knowledge of and/or ability to learn and implement a wide variety of software packages for processing and interpretation of analytical data.', '• Demonstrated ability to lead people and/or mentor scientists. Preferred:', '• Collaborate with co-workers and contribute to team activities.', '• Excellent organizational and prioritization skills.', "• Meet timelines for delivering on clients' expectations.", '• Communicate clearly and accurately with internal and external clients, both verbally and through written data summaries and reports.', 'All interested applicants must apply online.\xa0AMRI is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.']

job_text: ['', 'Job Title:', '有人脸识别尤其是活体检测领域的创新经历；有极端恶劣场景下的文字检测和识别领域的创新经历；顶级会议上论文发表经历；ACM，ICPC, NOI/IOI等比赛获奖经历；具有带团队经验的优先', '在计算机相关领域取得硕士以上学历；', '有人脸识别尤其是活体检测领域的创新经历；', '工作职责：', '有极端恶劣场景下的文字检测和识别领域的创新经历；', '加分项：', 'ACM，ICPC, NOI/IOI等比赛获奖经历；', '在计算机相关领域取得硕士以上学历；在机器视觉、机器学习、图像分析等领域具有四年以上的研究和工程经验；扎实的代码能力，熟练掌握Python 和 C/C++语言；熟练使用主流深度学习框架例如PyTorch, TensorFlow或者MxNet开发模型；优秀的书面和口头沟通能力，并具备英语沟通能力；', '顶级会议上论文发表经历；', '熟练使用主流深度学习框架例如PyTorch, TensorFlow或者MxNet开发模型；', '在机器视觉、机器学习、图像分析等领域具有四年以上的研究和工程经验；', '扎实的代码能力，熟练掌握Python 和 C/C++语言；', '具有带团队经验的优先', '优秀的书面和口头沟通能力，并具备英语沟通能力；']

['', 'Expand how we can help other departments utilize qualitative and quantitative research findings for their own initiatives', 'Do more generative and evaluative research', 'Report research findings to rest of department and company', 'Willingness to explore different ways to communicate insights to stakeholders beyond a typical research report', 'Execute recruiting practices to further build our research pool of existing users', 'Sigma is SaaS, next-generation business intelligence and data exploration platform that is disrupting the analytics landscape. Sigma offers a spreadsheet-like interface that enables all decision makers to securely analyze up to billions of rows of live data with the unlimited scale and speed of the cloud. With Sigma, everyone can quickly answer their own questions to make and visualize accurate, data-driven decisions.\xa0', 'Understand our customers more deeplyDo more research and testing earlier in the product development cycleDo more generative and evaluative researchIncrease volume and speed of usability testingExpand how we can help other departments utilize qualitative and quantitative research findings for their own initiatives', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills', 'Excellent at planning and executing UX research studies, from defining scope to documenting learnings', 'Collaborate with Product Design, Engineering, and PM teams (among others) in gathering requirements for research projects and creating plans to execute against them', 'Great at communicating research findings, with a focus on quality of communication and not length of report (8 bullet points everyone remembers > 30-slide report that no one does)', 'Ability to effectively match research methodologies to business problems\xa0', 'Ability to execute a range of research methodologies, especially usability testing and concept testing', 'Do more research and testing earlier in the product development cycle', 'Ability to collaborate across departments', 'Do quick and dirty research efforts or mini-studies. We won’t always have the resources to execute ideal research efforts so the ideal candidate will be able to determine what the minimum scope is that we need to get useful insights\xa0', 'Let’s be honest about that last part. Few business tools of any power have been truly easy for non-technical users to pick up. And that’s true in BI, but we’re going to change that. Our Research & Insights team has already uncovered keys for doing just that and we’re looking for a UX Researcher to help us get there.\xa0', 'Experience doing UX research for SaaS business tools or products with similarly complex workflows', 'Increase volume and speed of usability testing', 'You Will:', 'This role will help Sigma:', 'Work with the Head of Research & Insights to define research priorities\xa0Collaborate with Product Design, Engineering, and PM teams (among others) in gathering requirements for research projects and creating plans to execute against themUse methodologies such as contextual inquiry, user journey mapping, usability tests, quantitative surveys, concept testing, qualitative interviews, and more\xa0Report research findings to rest of department and companyHelp train other departments on research methodologies so they can perform simple research tasks themselvesDo quick and dirty research efforts or mini-studies. We won’t always have the resources to execute ideal research efforts so the ideal candidate will be able to determine what the minimum scope is that we need to get useful insights\xa0Execute recruiting practices to further build our research pool of existing users', '5+ years experience leading UX research projects or being the primary researcherExperience doing UX research for SaaS business tools or products with similarly complex workflowsAbility to effectively match research methodologies to business problems\xa0Ability to execute a range of research methodologies, especially usability testing and concept testingExcellent at planning and executing UX research studies, from defining scope to documenting learningsGreat at communicating research findings, with a focus on quality of communication and not length of report (8 bullet points everyone remembers > 30-slide report that no one does)Willingness to explore different ways to communicate insights to stakeholders beyond a typical research reportExperience with qualitative and quantitative data collection and analysisExcellent communication and presentation skillsAbility to collaborate across departmentsThe ability to resolve ambiguity where needed and move a research project forwardCreativity, flexibility, and a desire to really help our customers use Sigma', 'Understand our customers more deeply', 'Work with the Head of Research & Insights to define research priorities\xa0', 'Desired Experience and Skills:', 'The ability to resolve ambiguity where needed and move a research project forward', 'One of our goals is to move research further upstream in the product development lifecycle, so our team can more readily identify what to build and how to build it (rather than just test what was already built). This role will include a mix of usability testing and concept testing, along with some customer journey mapping and generative research.\xa0\xa0', 'Use methodologies such as contextual inquiry, user journey mapping, usability tests, quantitative surveys, concept testing, qualitative interviews, and more\xa0', '5+ years experience leading UX research projects or being the primary researcher', 'Experience with qualitative and quantitative data collection and analysis', 'Creativity, flexibility, and a desire to really help our customers use Sigma', 'Help train other departments on research methodologies so they can perform simple research tasks themselves']

['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Prior clinical trials experience strongly preferred Experience in HIV care and treatment program implementation in developing countries ', 'Provide technical assistance in other public health initiatives supported by ICAP, including HIV care and treatment, integration of HIV programs with COVID-19 testing and treatment programs and TB/HIV integration. This includes design of programs in partnership with in-country teams as well as provision of clinical mentorship, didactic teaching, and guidance to ICAP in-country staff in order to enhance technical capacity at the national, regional, and local levels for the delivery of high quality service programs.', 'Provide technical assistance in COVID-19 research studies that involve ICAP. This includes the development and/or refinement of protocols, questionnaires, training materials, reports, presentations, analysis plans and other tools needed for COVID-19 research trials.', 'Proficient in Microsoft Office applications (e.g., Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.)', 'PhD, MD or professional equivalent required', 'Work as Site Investigator at ICAP’s Bronx and/or Harlem Prevention Center to assist with implementation of COVID-19 and HIV clinical trials, including recruitment of staff, leading staff meetings, supporting development and revision of SOPs, reviewing screening summaries to determine eligibility of potential participants, advising on the clinical management of adverse events, liaising with clinical sites throughout the city to assist with recruitment of participants, and providing clinical support as needed.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Lead the development and/or refinement of materials, including technical updates, clinical guidelines, protocols, algorithms, dosing guides and other clinical support tools.', '5+ years of related experience with at least three years of experience in clinical and/or epidemiological research and adult HIV care and treatment', 'Requires international travel of approximately 2 trips per year with each trip lasting approximately 10 days and 6 domestic trips for clinical trial team meetings', 'Ability to work independently with minimal supervision', 'Excellent and effective communication skills in written and spoken English', 'Conduct visits to research sites and country programs to provide supervision and technical assistance in clinical and research issues including reviewing workplans, progress and challenges and conducting site visits to provide clinical mentorship and to assess quality of care and adherence to standards of care. Host technical meetings for in-country staff that aim to transfer knowledge, review progress, discuss implementation challenges and strategies on the way forward.', 'Demonstrated capability to establish and maintain effective professional relationships as well as managing technical teams', 'Experience in clinical training and mentorship', 'Experience in HIV care and treatment program implementation in developing countries', ' PhD, MD or professional equivalent required 5+ years of related experience with at least three years of experience in clinical and/or epidemiological research and adult HIV care and treatment Experience in clinical training and mentorship Demonstrated capability to establish and maintain effective professional relationships as well as managing technical teams Ability to work independently with minimal supervision Excellent and effective communication skills in written and spoken English Demonstrated experience in public speaking on clinical care issues in a manner which reflects subject matter expertise Proficient in Microsoft Office applications (e.g., Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.) ', 'Work with ICAP country teams and ICAP’s Strategic Information Unit to design methods for collection of relevant data as well as interpretation of data and support local use of data to enhance the delivery of high quality, evidence-based HIV care and treatment.', ' Provide technical assistance in COVID-19 research studies that involve ICAP. This includes the development and/or refinement of protocols, questionnaires, training materials, reports, presentations, analysis plans and other tools needed for COVID-19 research trials. Work as Site Investigator at ICAP’s Bronx and/or Harlem Prevention Center to assist with implementation of COVID-19 and HIV clinical trials, including recruitment of staff, leading staff meetings, supporting development and revision of SOPs, reviewing screening summaries to determine eligibility of potential participants, advising on the clinical management of adverse events, liaising with clinical sites throughout the city to assist with recruitment of participants, and providing clinical support as needed. Provide technical assistance in other public health initiatives supported by ICAP, including HIV care and treatment, integration of HIV programs with COVID-19 testing and treatment programs and TB/HIV integration. This includes design of programs in partnership with in-country teams as well as provision of clinical mentorship, didactic teaching, and guidance to ICAP in-country staff in order to enhance technical capacity at the national, regional, and local levels for the delivery of high quality service programs. Lead the development and/or refinement of materials, including technical updates, clinical guidelines, protocols, algorithms, dosing guides and other clinical support tools. Work with ICAP country teams and ICAP’s Strategic Information Unit to design methods for collection of relevant data as well as interpretation of data and support local use of data to enhance the delivery of high quality, evidence-based HIV care and treatment. Conduct visits to research sites and country programs to provide supervision and technical assistance in clinical and research issues including reviewing workplans, progress and challenges and conducting site visits to provide clinical mentorship and to assess quality of care and adherence to standards of care. Host technical meetings for in-country staff that aim to transfer knowledge, review progress, discuss implementation challenges and strategies on the way forward. Oversee and/or actively participate in the preparation of grant proposals and renewals relevant to ICAP; provide technical expertise for other grant writing activities within ICAP. Oversee and/or actively participate in the design, implementation and dissemination of research studies and public health evaluations. ', ' Requires international travel of approximately 2 trips per year with each trip lasting approximately 10 days and 6 domestic trips for clinical trial team meetings ', 'Oversee and/or actively participate in the preparation of grant proposals and renewals relevant to ICAP; provide technical expertise for other grant writing activities within ICAP.', 'Demonstrated experience in public speaking on clinical care issues in a manner which reflects subject matter expertise', 'Oversee and/or actively participate in the design, implementation and dissemination of research studies and public health evaluations.', 'Prior clinical trials experience strongly preferred']

Able to manage junior scientists or associates.', 'Qualifications', 'This position will be based in New Haven, CT*Position SummaryThe Research Scientist II supports research and development programs through the identification of preclinical and clinical biomarkers of disease activity and/or response to therapeutic treatment, the development of bioanalytical methods including cell-based methodology, the design and execution of experiments at the bench, the interpretation and presentation of data, translation into clinical programs and provides representation on cross-functional teams.Principal Responsibilities Independently research, design, troubleshoot, execute and interpret experiments, synthesize and communicate conclusions  Identify or discover biomarkers and develop, optimize and validate biomarker assays Lead a team to accomplish goals. Able to manage junior scientists or associates. Multi-task multiple projects, prioritizing appropriately and allocating effort Distill complex issues, articulate potential solutions and prioritize appropriately, but may seek coaching and feedback Serve as functional representative to project teams, able to knowledgeably and confidently represent the biomarkers team Excellent communication and presentation skills. Able to communicate the scientific story within Alexion and at external meetings and conferences Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work well as a member of a team Qualifications The Research Scientist II should have 3 - 5 years of relevant academic or industrial postdoctoral experience and exemplify the following attributes: Proven track record of creativity, innovation, independent thought and experimental design to deliver definitive results Ability to successfully execute and manage multiple projects simultaneously Strong collaborative and interpersonal skills; ability to successfully work as part of a team but also able to lead an inter-departmental project or initiative involving other contributors to accomplish a defined goal Excellent oral and written communication skills are essential. Solid track record of significant contribution to publications in peer reviewed journals and/or presentations at scientific meetings   Expertise in development, optimization and execution of biochemical, molecular and protein-based methods (e.g. expression analysis, chromatography, Westerns, enzyme assays, IHC, siRNA, RT-PCR, etc.). Next-Gen Sequencing and/or single cell analysis experience would be a plus Expertise in cell culture and cell-based assay development and validation including flow cytometry, confocal, reporter and signaling assays (utilizing primary, stem and/or transformed cells) in support of research and development initiatives Ability to identify relevant biomarkers that connect disease pathophysiology and response to treatment, develop, optimize, and validate biomarker assays in support of pre-clinical and clinical drug studies Experience in transferring assays to CROs and successful validation and delivery of quality results under tight timelines, either individually or as part of a team Familiarity with clinical sample handling and interpretation of clinical data is preferred Subject matter expertise (SME) in neuroinflammatory and/or neurodegenerative disorders and/or complement-mediated disease is strongly preferred Education Ph.D. or equivalent degree in Cell or Molecular Biology, Immunology, Pharmacology, Biochemistry, or other biomedical science with 3 - Able to communicate the scientific story within Alexion and at external meetings and conferences Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work well as a member of a team Qualifications The Research Scientist II should have 3 - 5 years of relevant academic or industrial postdoctoral experience and exemplify the following attributes: Proven track record of creativity, innovation, independent thought and experimental design to deliver definitive results Ability to successfully execute and manage multiple projects simultaneously Strong collaborative and interpersonal skills; ability to successfully work as part of a team but also able to lead an inter-departmental project or initiative involving other contributors to accomplish a defined goal Excellent oral and written communication skills are essential. Solid track record of significant contribution to publications in peer reviewed journals and/or presentations at scientific meetings   Expertise in development, optimization and execution of biochemical, molecular and protein-based methods (e.g. expression analysis, chromatography, Westerns, enzyme assays, IHC, siRNA, RT-PCR, etc.). Next-Gen Sequencing and/or single cell analysis experience would be a plus Expertise in cell culture and cell-based assay development and validation including flow cytometry, confocal, reporter and signaling assays (utilizing primary, stem and/or transformed cells) in support of research and development initiatives Ability to identify relevant biomarkers that connect disease pathophysiology and response to treatment, develop, optimize, and validate biomarker assays in support of pre-clinical and clinical drug studies Experience in transferring assays to CROs and successful validation and delivery of quality results under tight timelines, either individually or as part of a team Familiarity with clinical sample handling and interpretation of clinical data is preferred Subject matter expertise (SME) in neuroinflammatory and/or neurodegenerative disorders and/or complement-mediated disease is strongly preferred Education Ph.D. or equivalent degree in Cell or Molecular Biology, Immunology, Pharmacology, Biochemistry, or other biomedical science with 3 - 5 years of relevant academic or industrial postdoctoral experience LIDI-1,Some opportunities happen only once in a lifetime - like a job where you have the extraordinary opportunity to change lives. At Alexion, such opportunities arise through our unwavering mission to serve patients and families affected by rare diseases. These patients are our guiding star, and we act with integrity, urgency, and discipline because we know their lives are at stake.Alexion is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on serving patients and families affected by rare diseases and devastating conditions through the discovery, development and commercialization of life-changing medicines. As a leader in rare diseases for more than 25 years, Alexion has developed and commercializes two approved complement inhibitors to treat patients with paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) and atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome (aHUS), as well as the first and only approved complement inhibitor to treat anti-acetylcholine receptor (AchR) antibody-positive generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG) and neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (NMOSD). Alexion also has two highly innovative enzyme replacement therapies for patients with life-threatening and ultra-rare metabolic disorders, hypophosphatasia (HPP) and lysosomal acid lipase deficiency (LAL-D) as well as the first and only approved Factor Xa inhibitor reversal agent. In addition, the company is developing several mid-to-late-stage therapies, including a copper-binding agent for Wilson disease, an anti-neonatal Fc receptor (FcRn) antibody for rare Immunoglobulin G (IgG)-mediated diseases and an oral Factor D inhibitor as well as several early-stage therapies, including one for light chain (AL) amyloidosis, a second oral Factor D inhibitor and a third complement inhibitor. Alexion focuses its research efforts on novel molecules and targets in the complement cascade and its development efforts on the core therapeutic areas of hematology, nephrology, neurology, metabolic disorders and cardiology. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, Alexion has offices around the globe and serves patients in more than 50 countries. Further information about Alexion can be found at: www.alexion.com.As a leading employer in our industry, Alexion is proud to offer a highly competitive package of base and incentive compensation as well as a comprehensive benefits program designed to support the health, wellness and financial security of our employees and their families. Benefits include group medical, vision and dental coverage, group and supplemental life insurance, 401(k) with company match, tuition reimbursement, relocation assistance and much more.', 'Distill complex issues, articulate potential solutions and prioritize appropriately, but may seek coaching and feedback', 'Position Summary', 'The Research Scientist II should have 3 - 5 years of relevant academic or industrial postdoctoral experience and exemplify the following attributes: Proven track record of creativity, innovation, independent thought and experimental design to deliver definitive results Ability to successfully execute and manage multiple projects simultaneously Strong collaborative and interpersonal skills; ability to successfully work as part of a team but also able to lead an inter-departmental project or initiative involving other contributors to accomplish a defined goal Excellent oral and written communication skills are essential.
