job_title: Principal Research Scientist II/ Senior Principal Research Scientist, DNA Encoded Libraries (DEL) Lead
job_text: ['', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Qualifications: ', 'Highly skilled in protein handling and extensive experience in different biochemical and biophysical methods for protein characterization', 'Schedule', ' Lead a multidisciplinary team to enhance DEL screening processes and infrastructure Design and implement project-specific screening strategies with therapy area partners Align hit generation strategies with key project needs as key member of early drug discovery programs Align with protein biochemistry, biophysics, screening teams, project teams, and chemistry teams for hit follow-up Build internal platform learnings through active leadership of new methods development for DEL screening/selection and library design/enhancement  Maintain knowledge of current scientific literature and methods on DEL and other screening platforms. Contribute ideas and adopt novel technologies to improve research methodologies Champion innovation and generate new research strategies to effectively address project needs ', 'Excellent problem-solving skills, capable of finding innovative ways to overcome issues', 'Design and implement project-specific screening strategies with therapy area partners', 'Strong communication skills and the ability to contribute in a multidisciplinary environment are essential', 'PhD in Biochemistry, Biophysics, Chemistry, or related field with typically 8-10+ years of relevant academic and/or pharmaceutical industry experience', 'Significant Work Activities', ' PhD in Biochemistry, Biophysics, Chemistry, or related field with typically 8-10+ years of relevant academic and/or pharmaceutical industry experience Extensive hands-on experience in DEL selection and a strong track record in successfully applying DEL platform for hit generation Highly skilled in protein handling and extensive experience in different biochemical and biophysical methods for protein characterization Platform expertise beyond selection sciences (i.e. library construction, informatics, and/or deconvolution) required Excellent problem-solving skills, capable of finding innovative ways to overcome issues Strong communication skills and the ability to contribute in a multidisciplinary environment are essential Experience in leading teams/collaborations and ability to manage several projects simultaneously in a dynamic environment  ', 'Travel', 'Position will be hired based on level of experience.', 'Align hit generation strategies with key project needs as key member of early drug discovery programs', 'Lead a multidisciplinary team to enhance DEL screening processes and infrastructure', 'Experience in leading teams/collaborations and ability to manage several projects simultaneously in a dynamic environment ', 'Maintain knowledge of current scientific literature and methods on DEL and other screening platforms. Contribute ideas and adopt novel technologies to improve research methodologies', 'Platform expertise beyond selection sciences (i.e. library construction, informatics, and/or deconvolution) required', 'Champion innovation and generate new research strategies to effectively address project needs', 'Align with protein biochemistry, biophysics, screening teams, project teams, and chemistry teams for hit follow-up', 'Job Level Code', 'Extensive hands-on experience in DEL selection and a strong track record in successfully applying DEL platform for hit generation', 'Build internal platform learnings through active leadership of new methods development for DEL screening/selection and library design/enhancement ', 'About AbbVie', 'Job Type', 'Qualifications', 'Key Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Deep Learning / Artificial Intelligence Engineer
job_text: ['', "Be the primary contributor for scientific collaborations with Illumina's academic, nonprofit, and industry partners, and lead a multidisciplinary team focused on achieving these aims.", 'Develop novel statistical algorithms for classifying variants of unknown significance by integrating information from detailed clinical phenotypes, functional genomics, selective constraint, and protein structure.', 'Be willing to work in a fast paced, competitive environment, and hold a strong record of successful delivery of complex scientific projects and publications under tight timelines.', "Develop novel statistical algorithms for classifying variants of unknown significance by integrating information from detailed clinical phenotypes, functional genomics, selective constraint, and protein structure.Be the primary contributor for scientific collaborations with Illumina's academic, nonprofit, and industry partners, and lead a multidisciplinary team focused on achieving these aims.Publish and disseminate methods and findings and incorporate them into software products to the benefit of the wider genetics community.", 'Responsibilities', 'Education', 'Requirements', 'PhD in computer science, statistical genetics, or computational biology.', 'Possesses strong communication skills, with the ability to present complex scientific ideas to clinical, scientific, and industry audiences.', 'Expert in machine learning, statistics, and genomicsPossesses strong communication skills, with the ability to present complex scientific ideas to clinical, scientific, and industry audiences.Be willing to work in a fast paced, competitive environment, and hold a strong record of successful delivery of complex scientific projects and publications under tight timelines.', 'Expert in machine learning, statistics, and genomics', 'Publish and disseminate methods and findings and incorporate them into software products to the benefit of the wider genetics community.']

['', 'Clinical Data Expertise: Apply strong knowledge in one or more areas of clinical medicine to data and analytical needs.', 'Shift:', 'Program / Project Facilitation: Successfully facilitate or co-facilitate medium to small projects.', 'Description', 'Location:', 'Display / Visualization: Execute solid judgement in using data visualization tools such as Tableau to produce accurate and esthetic dashboards.', " Bachelor's Degree in Health Information Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, business administration, healthcare or a related clinical or analytic discipline OR 4 years of equivalent experience. 3 years relevant data analysis required; a biomedical setting is preferred. ", 'About Providence Alaska Medical Center', "Master's Degree in Health Information Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, business administration, healthcare or a related clinical or analytic discipline.", 'Data Validation / Accuracy: Evaluate the output of reports to identify errors, performs data validation, error detection, and error correction.', 'Providence is calling a Clinical Data Engineer (Quality Improvement, Days', 'Certification as a Health Care Quality Professional (CPHQ) optional.', 'About Us', 'Certification in an IT discipline, application, or tool within 2 years of hire.', 'Data Acquisition: Strong user of graphical user interface-based programs for complex data acquisition and manipulation and/or basic use of SQL.', '3 years relevant data analysis required; a biomedical setting is preferred.', 'Reporting / Analysis: Work with clients to develop and test hypotheses around straightforward questions; summarizes findings in concise communications, including dashboards and slide presentations.', 'Required qualifications for this position include:', ', 1.0 FTE) to Providence Alaska Medical Center in Anchorage, Alaska.', ' Clinical Data Expertise: Apply strong knowledge in one or more areas of clinical medicine to data and analytical needs. Data Acquisition: Strong user of graphical user interface-based programs for complex data acquisition and manipulation and/or basic use of SQL. Data Architecture: Design data sources with an understanding of the data architectural needs of complex projects. Data Validation / Accuracy: Evaluate the output of reports to identify errors, performs data validation, error detection, and error correction. Reporting / Analysis: Work with clients to develop and test hypotheses around straightforward questions; summarizes findings in concise communications, including dashboards and slide presentations. Display / Visualization: Execute solid judgement in using data visualization tools such as Tableau to produce accurate and esthetic dashboards. Mentorship/Training: Provide frequent training on the use of analytical tools to caregivers outside of Clinical Analytics and a mentor to colleagues. Statistics / Data Science: Use basic statistical skills and/or generate predictive models. Program / Project Facilitation: Successfully facilitate or co-facilitate medium to small projects. ', 'Job Category:', 'Experience with database query and analysis languages (e.g. SQL, R, Python) and/or data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, D3) highly desired.', 'Data Architecture: Design data sources with an understanding of the data architectural needs of complex projects.', 'Statistics / Data Science: Use basic statistical skills and/or generate predictive models.', " Master's Degree in Health Information Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, business administration, healthcare or a related clinical or analytic discipline. Certification as a Health Care Quality Professional (CPHQ) optional. Certification in an IT discipline, application, or tool within 2 years of hire. Experience with database query and analysis languages (e.g. SQL, R, Python) and/or data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, D3) highly desired. ", 'Our Mission', 'For Information On Our Comprehensive Range Of Benefits, Visit', 'Schedule:', 'We are a community of caregivers delivering every day on our Mission to provide compassionate care that is accessible for all - especially those who are poor and vulnerable.', 'In This Position, You Will', 'Preferred Qualifications For This Position Include', 'Qualifications', 'Req ID:', "Bachelor's Degree in Health Information Management, Computer Science, Mathematics, business administration, healthcare or a related clinical or analytic discipline OR 4 years of equivalent experience.", 'Mentorship/Training: Provide frequent training on the use of analytical tools to caregivers outside of Clinical Analytics and a mentor to colleagues.']

job_text: ['', 'Responsible for implementing various algorithms to do automated feature extraction and dataset augmentation, optimizing runtimes of neural network algorithms and building higher level abstractions for various common AI/ML techniques.', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a BS or MS from top notch CS programs with industry experience. We are looking for machine learning software engineers who have experience building at least one of the following: ML/AI models which are in production New neural network algorithms based on research papers Low level performance optimization of deep learning systems Machine learning platforms', 'Company Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We raised $18 million in Series A from Decibel Ventures and Eric Schmidt. We are looking for talented machine learning software engineers, systems software engineers and research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Job Description:']

["Courtesy Announcement:  Under funding from the National Science Foundation (2025329) Wyonano's research partner, the University of Wyoming, has an immediate opening for a post doctoral researcher studying novel 2D materials.  Candidates from a wide variety of disciplines will be considered including:  synthetic organic chemistry, materials science, chemical engineering, membrane engineering, catalyst design, or other related disciplines.  Interested candidates can submit resumes or contact Wyonano for more information.  Due to time constraints, only candidates legally authorized to work in the US are being considered at this time."]

"Big data" doesn\'t phase you. You have the skills to retrieve, combine, and analyze data from a variety of sources and structures. You know understanding the data is often the key to great data science. ', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) ', ' Build machine learning models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation ', " Bachelor's Degree plus 5 years of experience in data analytics, or Master's Degree plus 3 years in data analytics, or PhD  At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis  At least 1 year of experience with machine learning  At least 1 year of experience with relational databases ", ' Data is at the center of everything we do. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 200 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making. ', 'Team Description', 'The Ideal Candidate Is']

job_text: ['', 'Responsible for implementing various algorithms to do automated feature extraction and dataset augmentation, optimizing runtimes of neural network algorithms and building higher level abstractions for various common AI/ML techniques.', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a BS or MS from top notch CS programs with industry experience. We are looking for machine learning software engineers who have experience building at least one of the following: ML/AI models which are in production New neural network algorithms based on research papers Low level performance optimization of deep learning systems Machine learning platforms', 'Company Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We raised $18 million in Series A from Decibel Ventures and Eric Schmidt. We are looking for talented machine learning software engineers, systems software engineers and research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Job Description:']

['', 'e People Analytics Center of Excellence at Capital One is a 75 person cross-functional team of analysts, consultants, and data scientists. Within People Analytics, the Talent Systems Review team engages with key partners from Human Resources and Legal to build models that help Capital One review processes such as compensation, promotion, and performance. We utilize Python, SQL, AWS, and Tableau to build modular, scalable, statistical models, reporting infrastructure, and dashboards that will provide key insights about our talent systems. ', " As a Data Scientist on Capital One's People Analytics team , you'll be part of a mission critical talent system review team providing key insights to stakeholders at the highest levels of the organization. This role offers a unique opportunity to contribute to policy decisions that affect all of Capital One's current and future associates. ", 'Basic Qualifications', ' Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) At least 1 year of experience working with AWS At least 1 year experience with NLP At least 3 years\' experience in Python, Scala, or R At least 3 years\' experience with machine learning At least 3 years\' experience with SQL', 'In this role, you will:', 'Master\'s Degree in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in "STEM" field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)', 'Role Description', ' At least 1 year experience with NLP', 'At least 1 year of experience working with AWS', "At least 3 years' experience in Python, Scala, or R", 'Capital One will consider sponsoring a new qualified applicant for employment authorization for this position.', ' Flex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible insights and policy recommendations ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Innovative: You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. As a startup, we disrupted the credit card industry by individually personalizing every credit card offer using statistical modeling and the relational database, cutting edge technology in 1988! Fast-forward a few years, and this little innovation and our passion for data has skyrocketed us to a Fortune 100 company and a leader in the world of data-driven decision-making.', " At least 3 years' experience in Python, Scala, or R", 'The Ideal Candidate is', ' At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis', 'At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis', " At least 3 years' experience with SQL", ' At least 1 year of experience with machine learning', "Creative: You thrive on bringing definition to big, undefined problems. ', ' Innovative: You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies. ', ' Leverage a broad stack of technologies - Python, AWS, GitHub RedShift, and more - to reveal the insights hidden within huge volumes of recruiting data ', " Technical: You're comfortable with open-source languages and are passionate about developing further. ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Roles And Responsibilities', ' At least 1 year of coding experience in Python, Java, or JavaScript', ' Serve as a subject matter expert to support the engineers and product team to build new functionality.', 'Preferred Requirements', 'Masters Degree At least 2 years of combined experience in mathematical research, methodology, or software development At least 1 year of coding experience in Python, Java, or JavaScript', ' Research the industries, policies and behavior of financial planning solutions and investment products we want to build in the system. Innovate and develop the logic and the algorithms of how we should build our models and features, including developing mathematical models. Serve as a subject matter expert to support the engineers and product team to build new functionality. Assist with the quality control of the models built by the engineers in the application to ensure that they meet the mathematical and algorithmic spec, and that edge cases are handled correctly. Assist our wealth managers in using our software to model unique customer cases.', ' Basic knowledge of Monte Carlo Simulation methods, Finance or Investment modeling', ' PhD in Mathematics, Quantitative Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Financial Engineering, or Economics High level of interpersonal, teaching and communication skills Basic knowledge of Monte Carlo Simulation methods, Finance or Investment modeling Basic understanding of combinatorial optimization methods, computational complexity, polynomial-time algorithms and linear programming 5+ years of experience in mathematical research, methodology, or software development', ' At this time, Capital One will not sponsor a new applicant for employment authorization for this position.', ' Assist our wealth managers in using our software to model unique customer cases.', ' Research the industries, policies and behavior of financial planning solutions and investment products we want to build in the system.', ' Innovate and develop the logic and the algorithms of how we should build our models and features, including developing mathematical models.', ' At least 2 years of combined experience in mathematical research, methodology, or software development', 'Masters Degree', ' Assist with the quality control of the models built by the engineers in the application to ensure that they meet the mathematical and algorithmic spec, and that edge cases are handled correctly.', ' 5+ years of experience in mathematical research, methodology, or software development', ' PhD in Mathematics, Quantitative Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Financial Engineering, or Economics', ' High level of interpersonal, teaching and communication skills', ' Basic understanding of combinatorial optimization methods, computational complexity, polynomial-time algorithms and linear programming']

job_title: Data Scientist Senior - Computer Vision/Deep Learning (100% Remote Available)
job_text: ['', 'Experience in publishing at top ML, computer vision, NLP, or AI conferences and/or contributing to ML/AI-related open source projects and/or converting ML/AI papers into code is a plus.', "Master's degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, Statistics, or related field.6 additional years of related experience beyond the minimum required may be substituted in lieu of a degree.", 'Highly competent at data wrangling and data engineering in SQL and SAS as well as advanced machine learning (ML) techniques using Python; comfortable in cloud computing environments (Azure, GCP, AWS).Hands-on experience developing products that utilize advanced machine learning techniques like deep learning in areas such as computer vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), sensor data from the Internet of Things (IoT), and recommender systems; along with transitioning those solutions from the development environment into the production environment for full-time use.PhD in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, Operations Research, Statistics, or related field with coursework in advanced Machine Learning techniques (Natural Language Processing, Deep Neural Networks, etc).Experience in reinforcement learning, knowledge graphs and graph databases, Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), semi-supervised learning, multi-task learning is a plus.Experience in publishing at top ML, computer vision, NLP, or AI conferences and/or contributing to ML/AI-related open source projects and/or converting ML/AI papers into code is a plus.', 'Partners with business leaders across the organization to define business problems and research questions; Serves as key resource and Subject Matter Expert (SME) on cross functional, matrixed teams to solve highly complex work critical to the organization.', 'Tasks', 'available', 'Solid experience in at least one compiled language (e.g., Java, C or more or more) and one dynamic scripting language (Python, PERL, Ruby)', 'Experience in reinforcement learning, knowledge graphs and graph databases, Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), semi-supervised learning, multi-task learning is a plus.', 'Builds and maintains a robust library of reusable algorithms and supporting code such that research efforts are based on the highest quality data, are transparently conducted, are able to be productionized and are reproducible.', 'Minimum Education', "Master's degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, Statistics, or related field.", 'Hands-on experience developing products that utilize advanced machine learning techniques like deep learning in areas such as computer vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), sensor data from the Internet of Things (IoT), and recommender systems; along with transitioning those solutions from the development environment into the production environment for full-time use.', 'Serves as key resource and Subject Matter Expert (SME) on efforts to develop scalable, efficient, automated solutions for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation and model implementation.', 'Minimum Experience', 'Maintains academic and industry relationships for the purposes of research; Maintains expertise and awareness of cutting edge techniques, technologies and potential business solutions.', '6 or more years in predictive modeling, large data analysis and computer science', 'Experience in stochastic modeling, machine learning, and other advanced mathematical techniques (e.g., neural nets, simulation, graph analysis)', 'Conducts advanced analytics leveraging predictive modeling, machine learning, simulation, optimization and other techniques to deliver insights or develop analytical solutions to achieve business objectives.', 'Translates complex analytical and technical concepts to non-technical employees to enable understanding and drive informed business decisions.', 'Highly competent at data wrangling and data engineering in SQL and SAS as well as advanced machine learning (ML) techniques using Python; comfortable in cloud computing environments (Azure, GCP, AWS).', 'Works with IT to translate prototypes into new products, services, and features.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, Operations Research, Statistics, or related field with coursework in advanced Machine Learning techniques (Natural Language Processing, Deep Neural Networks, etc).', 'Builds large and complex information sets; Integrates and extracts relevant information from large amounts of both structured and unstructured data (internal and external) to enable analytical solutions.', 'Preferred', 'About USAA', '6 additional years of related experience beyond the minimum required may be substituted in lieu of a degree.', 'Partners with business leaders across the organization to define business problems and research questions; Serves as key resource and Subject Matter Expert (SME) on cross functional, matrixed teams to solve highly complex work critical to the organization.Builds large and complex information sets; Integrates and extracts relevant information from large amounts of both structured and unstructured data (internal and external) to enable analytical solutions.Conducts advanced analytics leveraging predictive modeling, machine learning, simulation, optimization and other techniques to deliver insights or develop analytical solutions to achieve business objectives.Serves as key resource and Subject Matter Expert (SME) on efforts to develop scalable, efficient, automated solutions for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation and model implementation.Works with IT to translate prototypes into new products, services, and features.Builds and maintains a robust library of reusable algorithms and supporting code such that research efforts are based on the highest quality data, are transparently conducted, are able to be productionized and are reproducible.Translates complex analytical and technical concepts to non-technical employees to enable understanding and drive informed business decisions.Maintains academic and industry relationships for the purposes of research; Maintains expertise and awareness of cutting edge techniques, technologies and potential business solutions.', 'Relocation', '6 or more years in predictive modeling, large data analysis and computer scienceExperience in stochastic modeling, machine learning, and other advanced mathematical techniques (e.g., neural nets, simulation, graph analysis)Solid experience in at least one compiled language (e.g., Java, C or more or more) and one dynamic scripting language (Python, PERL, Ruby)']

You know understanding the data is often the key to great data science.Communicator: You can communicate complex ideas clearly. You stay current on published state-of-the-art methods, technologies, and applications and seek out opportunities to apply them.Customer & Business-Minded. You have an astute ability to understand the customer and business problem that is to be solved and can drive towards impactful outcomes.Leader. You challenge conventional thinking and traditional ways of operating and you work with stakeholders to identify and improve the status quo.', 'Evaluating the landscape of tools to understand what will unlock new capabilities and performance and what is just a distraction;Leading multiple initiatives involving exploration and analysis of data across a variety of data platforms;Motivating and mentoring the Modeling & Data team of data scientists and quantitative modelers to deepen their understanding and use of cutting edge data science and machine learning methods;Leveraging extensive, deep technical knowledge and team leadership skills to drive the development of data science solutions and implement data-driven recommendations and outcomes;Developing and deploying predictive models to better understand and manage our credit risk and exposure;Collaborating with data engineers, data scientists, product managers, and other business analysts to create a nimble and resilient modeling infrastructure that enables CICD;', 'Communicator: You can communicate complex ideas clearly.
